abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 damage.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 96 additional damage over 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Wandering Keg
heroics.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

heroics.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroics.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.
